translations.Duplicates search initiated (this may ta: Utafutaji wa nakala rudufu umeanzishwa (hii inaweza kuchukua muda)
translations.All general settings to modify Duplicate: Mipangilio yote ya jumla ya kurekebisha tabia za Kipataji Nakala.
translations.When true, files mounted on external sto: Ikiwa ni kweli, faili zilizopachikwa kwenye hifadhi ya nje zitapuuzwa.
translations.Disable Filesystem Events: Zima Matukio ya Mfumo wa Faili
translations.When true, the event-based detection wil: Iwapo ni kweli, utambuzi unaotegemea tukio utazimwa.
translations.Disable filesystem events: Zima matukio ya mfumo wa faili
translations.Background Job Cleanup Interval (seconds: Muda Wa Kusafisha Kazi ya Nyuma (sekunde)
translations.The interval in seconds between database: Muda wa sekunde kati ya shughuli za kusafisha hifadhidata. Kazi hii hudumisha hifadhidata pekee na haifuti faili zozote kutoka kwa hifadhi yako. Husaidia kuweka programu kufanya kazi vizuri kwa kuondoa maingizo ya hifadhidata yaliyopitwa na wakati.
translations.Background Job Find Duplicates Interval: Muda wa Kutafuta Nakala za Kazi ya Usuli (sekunde)
translations.The interval in seconds for the find dup: Muda katika sekunde kwa kazi ya mandharinyuma ya find inarudia.
translations.Advanced settings (be cautious): Mipangilio ya hali ya juu (kuwa mwangalifu)
translations.These settings are for advanced users on: Mipangilio hii ni ya watumiaji wa hali ya juu pekee. Ikiwa huna uhakika unachofanya, tafadhali usizibadilishe.
translations.Are you sure you want to merge all selec: Je, una uhakika unataka kuunganisha nakala zote zilizochaguliwa? Kitendo hiki hakiwezi kutenduliwa.
translations.Some groups had all files selected. One: Baadhi ya vikundi vilikuwa na faili zote zilizochaguliwa. Faili moja kutoka kwa kila kikundi imehifadhiwa kiotomatiki.
translations.Preview and merge multiple duplicates at: Hakiki na uunganishe nakala nyingi kwa wakati mmoja huku ukihifadhi faili kwenye folda zilizolindwa.
translations.Total files to delete: {count}, Space th: Jumla ya faili za kufuta: {count}, Nafasi ambayo itatolewa: {size}
translations.No duplicate files were found that can b: Hakuna nakala za faili zilizopatikana ambazo zinaweza kufutwa. Hii inaweza kuwa kwa sababu hakuna nakala, au nakala zote ziko kwenye folda zilizolindwa.
translations.For each duplicate group, at least one f: Kwa kila kikundi cha nakala, angalau faili moja itahifadhiwa.
translations.Files in origin folders are automaticall: Faili zilizo katika folda asili zinalindwa kiotomatiki na hazitafutwa.
translations.All {count} files are in origin folders: Faili zote {count} ziko katika folda asili na haziwezi kufutwa
translations.This action will delete all instances of: Kitendo hiki kitafuta matukio yote ya nakala. Angalau nakala moja inapaswa kuwekwa. Je, una uhakika unataka kuendelea?
translations.File hash copied to clipboard: Hash ya faili imenakiliwa kwenye ubao wa kunakili
translations.Welcome, the current duplicate has {numb: Karibu, nakala ya sasa ina faili {numberOfFiles}, ukubwa wa jumla: {formattedSize}
translations.No duplicates found or no duplicate sele: Hakuna nakala zilizopatikana au hakuna nakala iliyochaguliwa.
translations.You can adjust settings or run a new sca: Unaweza kurekebisha mipangilio au kuendesha uchanganuzi mpya ili kupata nakala.
translations.See practical examples of finding and ma: Tazama mifano ya vitendo ya kutafuta na kudhibiti nakala
translations.Find answers to common questions: Tafuta majibu kwa maswali ya kawaida
translations.Folder {folder} removed from excluded fo: Folda {folder} imeondolewa kwenye folda ambazo hazijajumuishwa
translations.Configure folders that should be exclude: Sanidi folda ambazo zinapaswa kutengwa kutoka kwa uchanganuzi unaorudiwa. Faili katika folda hizi (na folda ndogo) zitapuuzwa wakati wa kutambua nakala.
translations.Configure filtering rules to ignore file: Sanidi sheria za kuchuja ili kupuuza faili wakati wa kuchanganua kulingana na heshi ya faili au muundo wa jina la faili.
translations.You can use * as wildcard, e.g., *.tmp o: Unaweza kutumia * kama wildcard, k.m., *.tmp au chelezo_*.
translations.This folder is already an origin folder: Folda hii tayari ni folda ya asili
translations.Folder added to origin folders: Folda imeongezwa kwenye folda za asili
translations.Folder {folder} removed from origin fold: Folda {folder} imeondolewa kwenye folda ya asili
translations.Configure folders that should be conside: Sanidi folda ambazo zinapaswa kuzingatiwa kama folda asili. Faili katika folda hizi hazitawahi kuwekewa alama kama nakala zinazopaswa kufutwa.
translations.Project scan initiated. This may take a: Uchanganuzi wa mradi umeanzishwa. Hii inaweza kuchukua muda.
translations.No duplicate files were found in the sel: Hakuna nakala za faili zilizopatikana katika folda zilizochaguliwa.
translations.Create and manage projects to scan speci: Unda na udhibiti miradi ili kuchanganua folda mahususi kwa nakala. Miradi hukuruhusu kuangazia kunakili faili katika maeneo mahususi bila kuchanganua hifadhi yako yote
translations.Create a project to scan specific folder: Unda mradi wa kuchanganua folda maalum kwa nakala
translations.Are you sure you want to delete the proj: Je, una uhakika unataka kufuta mradi "{name}"?
translations.Duplicate Finder is a Nextcloud app that: Duplicate Finder ni programu ya Nextcloud inayokusaidia kupata na kudhibiti nakala za faili katika hifadhi yako ya wingu. Inachanganua faili zako kiotomatiki na kutambua nakala kulingana na yaliyomo.
translations.The app uses file content hashing to ide: Programu hutumia hashing ya maudhui ya faili kutambua nakala. Hii inamaanisha kuwa faili zilizo na maudhui yanayofanana hugunduliwa kama nakala, bila kujali majina au maeneo yao.
translations.How can I protect important files from d: Ninawezaje kulinda faili muhimu dhidi ya kufutwa?
translations.Use the Origin Folders feature in settin: Tumia kipengele cha Folda za Asili katika mipangilio. Faili zilizo katika folda hizi hazitawahi kuwekewa alama kama nakala za kufutwa, na hivyo kuhakikisha kuwa faili zako asili zinalindwa kila wakati.
translations.You can exclude folders in two ways:\n\n:
Unaweza kuzitenga folda kwa njia mbili:

1. Ziongeze kwenye Folda Zisizojumuishwa katika mipangilio
2. Weka faili ya .nodupefinder kwenye folda yoyote unayotaka kuitenga
translations.Projects allow you to scan specific fold:
Miradi hukuruhusu kuchanganua folda mahususi kwa nakala badala ya hifadhi yako yote. Ili kutumia miradi:

1. Nenda kwa Mipangilio → Miradi
2. Unda mradi mpya kwa jina
3. Teua folda unazotaka kujumuisha kwenye tambazo
4. Anza tambazo na uone matokeo

Miradi ni bora kwa kulenga kusafisha maeneo mahususi ya hifadhi yako bila kuchanganua kila kitu.
translations.Yes, all files deleted through Duplicate: Ndiyo, faili zote zilizofutwa kupitia Duplicate Finder zinaweza kurejeshwa kutoka kwa pipa lako la Nextcloud katika kipindi cha uhifadhi kilichowekwa na msimamizi wako.
translations.There are several ways to exclude files:
Kuna njia kadhaa za kuwatenga faili kutoka kwa skanning:

1. Tumia Vichujio vya Hashi ya Faili: Ongeza heshi maalum za faili katika mipangilio ili kupuuza faili halisi.
2. Tumia Miundo ya Jina la Faili: Ongeza ruwaza kama "*.tmp" au "chelezo_*" ili kupuuza faili zinazolingana na ruwaza hizi.
3. Weka faili ya .nodupefinder: Ongeza faili hii kwenye folda ili kutenga folda nzima na folda zake ndogo.
4. Sanidi Folda za Asili: Weka alama kwenye folda kama folda asili ili kulinda faili zao.
5. Tumia Folda Zilizotengwa: Ondoa kwa uwazi folda maalum kutoka kwa kuchanganua.

Unaweza kudhibiti vichujio katika Mipangilio → Vichujio.
translations.File filters work in two ways:\n\n1. Has:
Vichujio vya faili hufanya kazi kwa njia mbili:

 1. Vichujio vya Hash: Hivi hulinganisha faili halisi kwa hash ya maudhui yao. Tumia hii unapotaka kupuuza faili maalum bila kujali jina au eneo lao. 
2. Vichujio vya Muundo wa Jina: Hivi hutumia alama za mwitu kulinganisha majina ya faili. Kwa mfano: 
- *.tmp: Inapuuza faili zote zinazoishia na .tmp 
- backup_*: Inapuuza faili zote zinazoanza na backup_ 
- *cache*: Inapuuza faili zote zenye cache 

Vichujio ni maalum kwa mtumiaji na hudumu katika uchanganuzi.
translations.The app is designed to minimize performa: Programu imeundwa ili kupunguza athari za utendakazi. Inatumia kazi za chinichini na inaweza kusanidiwa ili kupuuza faili zilizopachikwa. Unaweza pia kurekebisha vipindi vya kuchanganua katika mipangilio.
translations.The app maintains a small database of fi: Programu hudumisha hifadhidata ndogo ya heshi za faili. Athari ya uhifadhi ni ndogo na hupimwa kwa ufanisi kwa hesabu ya faili zako.
translations.How do I report issues or suggest featur: Ninawezaje kuripoti matatizo au kupendekeza vipengele?
translations.You can report issues and suggest featur: Unaweza kuripoti masuala na kupendekeza vipengele kupitia ukurasa wetu wa GitHub Issues.
translations.Yes! The project is open source under th: Ndiyo! Mradi huo ni chanzo wazi chini ya leseni ya AGPL. Tembelea hazina yetu ya GitHub ili kuchangia.
translations.How can I efficiently search for specifi: Ninawezaje kutafuta kwa ufanisi nakala maalum?
translations.The app offers three powerful search mod:
Programu inatoa njia tatu za utafutaji zenye nguvu:

1. Utafutaji Rahisi:
• Inafaa kwa utafutaji wa maandishi ya kimsingi
• Charaza tu sehemu yoyote ya jina la faili
• Mfano: kuandika "likizo" hupata faili zote zilizo na neno

2. Utafutaji wa Wildcard:
• Tumia * kwa herufi nyingi na ? kwa herufi moja
• Nzuri kwa kutafuta ruwaza katika majina ya faili
• Mifano:
- IMG*.jpg hupata faili zote za JPG kuanzia IMG
- DSC_????.NEF hupata faili za NEF zenye herufi 4 haswa baada ya DSC_

3. Utafutaji wa Maonyesho ya Kawaida:
• Kwa ulinganifu wa hali ya juu
• Inaauni syntax kamili ya regex
• Mifano:
- ^IMG_\d{4}\.jpg$ inalingana na IMG_ ikifuatiwa na tarakimu 4 haswa na .jpg
- \.(jpg|jpeg|png)$ hupata faili zinazoishia kwa .jpg, au .jpg
translations.What are some tips for effective searchi: Ni baadhi ya vidokezo vipi vya kutafuta kwa ufanisi?
translations.• Start with simple search for basic que:
• Anza na utafutaji rahisi wa maswali ya msingi
• Tumia kadi-mwitu unapojua sehemu ya muundo wa jina la faili
• Badilisha hadi regex kwa mahitaji changamano ya kulinganisha muundo
• Changanya na vichujio ili kupunguza matokeo
• Angalia moduli ya usaidizi kwa mifano ya muundo
• Kumbuka kwamba utafutaji haujali kesi.
translations.Try adjusting your search terms: Jaribu kurekebisha maneno yako ya utafutaji
translations.There are three main ways to detect dupl: Kuna njia tatu kuu za kugundua faili zilizorudiwa kwenye Nextcloud yako:
translations.Automatically scans for duplicates when: Hutafuta nakala kiotomatiki faili zinapopakiwa au kurekebishwa
translations.Provides real-time duplicate detection: Hutoa utambuzi wa nakala katika wakati halisi
translations.Can be disabled in settings if needed: Inaweza kulemazwa katika mipangilio ikiwa inahitajika
translations.Background Job Find Duplicates Interval: Muda wa Kutafuta Nakala za Kazi ya Mandharinyuma
translations.Set how often the system should scan for: Weka ni mara ngapi mfumo unapaswa kuchanganua nakala
translations.Runs automatically based on your configu: Huendesha kiotomatiki kulingana na muda uliosanidiwa
translations.The app provides three different search: Programu hutoa njia tatu tofauti za utafutaji ili kukusaidia kupata nakala maalum:
translations.Basic text search that looks for the exa: Utafutaji wa maandishi wa kimsingi ambao hutafuta maandishi kamili katika majina ya faili
translations.Example: typing \"vacation\" will find a: Mfano: kuandika "likizo" utapata faili zote zilizo na "likizo" kwa jina lao
translations.Use * and ? as wildcards to match patter: Tumia * na ? kama kadi-mwitu ili kulinganisha mifumo katika majina ya faili
translations.Match all JPG files starting with IMG:: Linganisha faili zote za JPG kuanzia na IMG:
translations.Match NEF files with exact pattern:: Linganisha faili za NEF na muundo halisi:
translations.For advanced users, full regex pattern s: Kwa watumiaji wa hali ya juu, msaada kamili wa muundo wa regex kwa ulinganishaji sahihi
translations.Match IMG_ or DSC_ prefix:: Linganisha kiambishi awali cha IMG_ au DSC_:
translations.Projects allow you to scan specific fold: Miradi hukuruhusu kuchanganua folda mahususi kwa nakala badala ya hifadhi yako yote:
translations.Go to Settings → Projects to create and: Nenda kwenye Mipangilio → Miradi ili kuunda na kudhibiti miradi yako
Upe mradi wako jina la maelezo (k.m., "Picha 2023", "Usafishaji wa Hati")
translations.Select one or more folders to include in: Chagua folda moja au zaidi ili kujumuisha katika uchanganuzi wa mradi
translations.Edit or delete projects as needed from t: Hariri au ufute miradi inavyohitajika kutoka kwa mipangilio ya Miradi
translations.Start a scan from the Projects section i: Anza kuchanganua kutoka sehemu ya Miradi katika Mipangilio
translations.Access your project from the navigation: Fikia mradi wako kutoka kwa upau wa kando wa kusogeza
translations.View scan results showing duplicates onl: Tazama matokeo ya kuchanganua yanayoonyesha nakala ndani ya folda ulizochagua pekee
translations.Manage duplicates using the same tools a: Dhibiti nakala ukitumia zana sawa na utambazaji wa kawaida
translations.Clean up a specific photo collection wit: Safisha mkusanyiko mahususi wa picha bila kuchanganua maktaba yako yote
translations.Deduplicate a shared folder that contain: Toa nakala ya folda iliyoshirikiwa ambayo ina faili nyingi rudufu
translations.Focus on large files in specific folders: Lenga faili kubwa katika folda maalum ili upate nafasi kwa haraka
translations.Organize cleanup tasks by creating separ: Panga kazi za kusafisha kwa kuunda miradi tofauti kwa maeneo tofauti
translations.Once duplicates are detected, you have s: Mara nakala zinapogunduliwa, una chaguo kadhaa za kuzidhibiti:
translations.View duplicates in Unacknowledged and Ac: Tazama nakala katika sehemu Zisizokubaliwa na Zilizokubaliwa
translations.Compare file details and select which co: Linganisha maelezo ya faili na uchague nakala za kufuta
translations.Mark duplicates as acknowledged for bett: Weka alama kwenye nakala kama inavyokubalika kwa mpangilio bora
translations.Recover deleted files from trash if need: Rejesha faili zilizofutwa kutoka kwa tupio ikiwa inahitajika
translations.Use Bulk Delete to handle multiple dupli: Tumia Ufutaji Wingi kushughulikia nakala nyingi kwa wakati mmoja
translations.Filter and select duplicates based on va: Chuja na uchague nakala kulingana na vigezo mbalimbali
translations.Preview selections before confirming del: Hakiki chaguo kabla ya kuthibitisha kufutwa
translations.Efficiently manage large numbers of dupl: Dhibiti kwa ufanisi idadi kubwa ya nakala
translations.Configure the app behavior through these: Sanidi tabia ya programu kupitia mipangilio hii ya kina:
translations.Skip external storage during scanning: Ruka hifadhi ya nje wakati wa kuchanganua
translations.Turn off automatic scanning on file chan: Zima utambazaji kiotomatiki kwenye mabadiliko ya faili
translations.Adjust frequency of automatic scans: Rekebisha mawimbi kwa mchanganuo wa kiotomatiki
translations.Learn how to use filters to exclude spec: Jifunze jinsi ya kutumia vichujio ili kutenga faili mahususi kutokana na ugunduzi unaorudiwa:
translations.Go to Settings → Filters to access the f: Nenda kwenye Mipangilio → Vichujio ili kufikia udhibiti wa kichujio
translations.Choose between two types of filters:: Chagua kati ya aina mbili za vichujio:
translations.File Hash: For excluding specific files: Hash ya faili: Kwa kuondoa faili maalum
translations.File Name Pattern: For excluding files m: Mchoro wa Jina la Faili: Kwa kutojumuisha faili zinazolingana na mchoro
translations.Using File Hash Filters: Kutumia Vichungi vya Hashi vya Faili
translations.1. Open the duplicate details of a file: 1. Fungua maelezo ya nakala ya faili unayotaka kutenga
translations.2. Copy the file hash from the details v: 2. Nakili heshi ya faili kutoka kwa mwonekano wa maelezo
translations.3. Switch to the File Hash tab in Filter: 3. Badilisha hadi kwenye kichupo cha Hashi ya Faili katika Vichujio
translations.Using File Name Patterns: Kutumia Miundo ya Jina la Faili
translations.1. Switch to the File Name Pattern tab i: 1. Badilisha hadi kwenye kichupo cha Muundo wa Jina la Faili kwenye Vichujio
2. Weka mchoro ukitumia * kama kadi-mwitu. Mifano:
translations.View all your active filters in the list: Tazama vichujio vyako vyote vinavyotumika kwenye orodha
translations.Remove unwanted filters using the delete: Ondoa vichungi visivyohitajika kwa kutumia kitufe cha kufuta
translations.Note: Changes take effect on the next sc: Kumbuka: Mabadiliko huanza kutumika kwenye skanisho inayofuata
translations.Files in these folders (and subfolders): Faili katika folda hizi (na folda ndogo) zitapuuzwa wakati wa kutambua nakala
translations.Improves scanning performance by skippin: Huboresha utendakazi wa kuchanganua kwa kuruka maeneo yasiyo ya lazima
translations.Useful for folders that intentionally co: Inafaa kwa folda ambazo zina nakala kwa makusudi
translations.Skip scanning backup directories that na: Ruka saraka za chelezo ambazo kwa asili zina nakala
translations.Exclude temporary and cache folders: Ondoa folda za muda na kache
translations.Skip .git and other version control dire: Ruka .git na saraka nyingine za udhibiti wa matoleo
translations.Use the file picker to choose folders to: Tumia kiteuzi faili kuchagua folda za kutenga
translations.Manage your excluded folders list as nee: Dhibiti orodha yako ya folda zisizojumuishwa inavyohitajika
translations.Excluding too many folders might cause y: Kuondoa folda nyingi kunaweza kusababisha ukose nakala halisi. Tumia kipengele hiki kwa busara.
translations.You can now start managing your duplicat: Sasa unaweza kuanza kudhibiti nakala za faili zako. Fikia mipangilio wakati wowote kwa chaguo zaidi.
translations.Help us make Duplicate Finder even bette: Tusaidie kufanya Kipataji Nakala bora zaidi!
translations.Show your support by starring the projec: Onyesha usaidizi wako kwa kuweka nyota kwenye mradi
translations.Help us improve by sharing your ideas: Tusaidie kuboresha kwa kushiriki mawazo yako
translations.Join our community of developers: Jiunge na jumuiya yetu ya watengenezaji
translations.Basic text search in file names: Utafutaji wa maandishi ya kimsingi katika majina ya faili
translations.Use * and ? to match patterns (e.g., IMG: Tumia * na ? ili kulinganisha ruwaza (k.m., IMG*.jpg)
translations.Advanced pattern matching for precise se: Ulinganishaji wa muundo wa hali ya juu kwa utafutaji sahihi
translations.Files are automatically scanned when upl: Faili huchanganuliwa kiotomatiki zinapopakiwa au kurekebishwa
translations.Background jobs regularly scan for new d: Kazi za usuli mara kwa mara huchanganua ili kupata nakala mpya
translations.Manual scans can be triggered from setti: Uchanganuzi wa mikono unaweza kuanzishwa kutoka kwa mipangilio
translations.View all duplicates in the \"Unacknowled: Tazama nakala zote katika sehemu za "Zisizokubaliwa" na "Zinazokubaliwa".
translations.Select which copies to delete while keep: Chagua nakala za kufuta huku ukihifadhi nakala asili
translations.Mark duplicates as acknowledged to organ: Weka alama kwenye nakala kama zimekubaliwa ili kuzipanga vyema
translations.Use \"Bulk Delete\" feature to handle mu: Tumia kipengele cha "Futa kwa Wingi" ili kushughulikia nakala nyingi kwa wakati mmoja
translations.Select multiple files for deletion in a: Chagua faili nyingi za kufutwa katika operesheni moja
translations.Review your selection before confirming: Kagua chaguo lako kabla ya kuthibitisha kufutwa
translations.Use file hash filters to ignore specific: Tumia vichungi vya hashi vya faili ili kupuuza faili maalum
translations.Create name patterns to exclude files (e: Unda ruwaza za majina ili kutenga faili (k.m., *.tmp, chelezo_*)
translations.All deleted files can be recovered from: Faili zote zilizofutwa zinaweza kurejeshwa kutoka kwa pipa la Nextcloud wakati wa kuhifadhi.
translations.Files in origin folders will never be ma: Faili zilizo katika folda asili hazitawahi kuwekewa alama kama nakala zinazopaswa kufutwa
translations.Use this for folders containing your ori: Tumia hii kwa folda zilizo na faili zako asili au kuu
translations.Ensures important files are always prese: Inahakikisha faili muhimu zinahifadhiwa kila wakati
translations.Navigate to Settings > Origin Folders: Nenda kwenye Mipangilio > Folda za Asili
translations.Use the file picker to select important: Tumia kiteua faili ili kuchagua folda muhimu
translations.Add or remove folders as needed: Ongeza au ondoa folda kama inahitajika
translations.Consider using origin folders for your p: Fikiria kutumia folda asili kwa maktaba yako ya picha, hati muhimu, au faili zingine zozote zisizoweza kubadilishwa.
translations.Projects allow you to scan specific fold: Miradi hukuruhusu kuchanganua folda mahususi kwa nakala badala ya hifadhi yako yote. Hii ni muhimu unapotaka kuzingatia kusafisha nakala katika maeneo fulani ya Nextcloud yako.
translations.Add one or more folders to include in th: Ongeza folda moja au zaidi ili kujumuisha katika uchanganuzi
translations.You can select any folders from your Nex: Unaweza kuchagua folda zozote kutoka kwa hifadhi yako ya Nextcloud. Uchanganuzi utatafuta nakala ndani ya folda hizi pekee.
translations.From the Projects section in Settings, c: Kutoka kwenye sehemu ya Miradi katika Mipangilio, bofya "Anza Kuchanganua" kwenye mradi wako
translations.Alternatively, select your project from: Vinginevyo, chagua mradi wako kutoka kwa upau wa urambazaji na ubofye "Anza Kuchanganua"
translations.Wait for the scan to complete - this may: Subiri uchanganuzi ukamilike - hii inaweza kuchukua muda kulingana na idadi ya faili
translations.Click \"View Results\" on your project o: Bofya "Angalia Matokeo" kwenye mradi wako au uchague kutoka kwa upau wa kando wa kusogeza
translations.Browse through the duplicates found with: Vinjari nakala zilizopatikana ndani ya folda ulizochagua
translations.Use the same tools as with regular dupli: Tumia zana sawa na zilizo na nakala za kawaida ili kudhibiti na kufuta faili
translations.Edit a project to change its name or inc: Hariri mradi ili kubadilisha jina lake au folda zilizojumuishwa
translations.Create multiple projects for different a: Unda miradi mingi ya maeneo tofauti ya hifadhi yako
translations.Deleting a project only removes the proj: Kufuta mradi huondoa tu usanidi wa mradi, sio faili zako zozote.
translations.Target specific areas instead of your en: Lenga maeneo mahususi badala ya hifadhi yako yote
translations.Scanning fewer files means quicker compl: Kuchanganua faili chache kunamaanisha kukamilisha haraka
translations.Organize your duplicate cleanup by proje: Panga usafishaji wako unaorudiwa kulingana na miradi
translations.Focus on cleaning up specific collection: Zingatia kusafisha makusanyo au folda maalum
translations.Using OCC command (admin only):: Kwa kutumia amri ya OCC (msimamizi pekee):
translations.Using Duplicate Finder Settings (admin o: Kwa kutumia Mipangilio ya Kiteua Nakala (msimamizi pekee):

translations.configure automatic scanning interval: Sanidi muda wa uchunguzi wa kiotomatiki
translations.exclude external storage from scanning: Ondoa uhifadhi wa nje kutoka kwenye uchanganuzi
translations.turn off automatic scanning on file chan: Zima uchanganuzi wa kiotomatiki kwenye mabadiliko ya faili
translations.This guide will help you get started wit: Mwongozo huu utakusaidia kuanza kutafuta na kudhibiti faili zilizorudiwa.
translations.Cannot delete file as it is in an origin: Haiwezi kufuta faili kama ilivyo kwenye folda asili
Hitilafu katika kuleta nakala kwa uhakiki.
translations.Failed to add folder to excluded folders: Imeshindwa kuongeza folda kwenye folda ambazo hazijajumuishwa
translations.Failed to remove folder from excluded fo: Imeshindwa kuondoa folda kutoka kwa folda zisizojumuishwa
